english.segment1: We will make this promise. On the memories we've made. A friendship born in heaven. Will last though all our days
english.segment2: A part of me goes with you. Even if you journey far. You'll never be forgotten. No matter where you are
english.segment3: Across the miles, please remember. When I can't be there. I will send my heart to you. Upon the wings of prayer
english.segment4: Across the miles, may God keep you. Through the tears and smiles. For His love will reach across the miles
english.segment5: May your life be a blessing. May all your dreams come true. May the Lord be with you. In everything you do
english.segment6: In all of your tomorrows. Wherever life may lead. This bond will go unbroken. When you know someone believes
english.segment7: Across the miles, please remember. When I can't be there. I will send my heart to you. Upon the wings of prayer
